title: Obtain the Sinner
text: You've woken me from reverie. I should thank you, but... where else does a dancer without a stage belong?

title: Raise to Phase 1
text: It is my destiny to comfort more souls with this power. I won't run away from it anymore.

title: Raise to Phase 3
text: This is not yet the end. Until my life burns out, my dance will go on.

title: Level Start
text: The battered soul is singing, leading the way for us.

title: Win Battles
text: The revelry is over. Rest in peace, I will take you home.

title: Lose Battles
text: The music ends, the dance stops, the crowd vanishes...

title: Ultimate Skill
text: Let the dance begin!

title: Die in Battles
text: Don't drop the curtain yet...

title: Greeting
text: Whenever I'm lost in reverie, you'll show up and pull me back to reality... Hello, Chief. Welcome back.

title: Conversation 1
text: With the purest admiration for art in the audience, and the utter beauty in the world to interpret, I do not feel lonely.

title: Conversation 2
text: Insatiable desire, a siege by Corruptors, and a dark prison cell, which one is real imprisonment?

title: Conversation 3
text: The body can speak for me, expressing gratitude, joy, struggle, and pain... Unfortunately, not everyone can understand it.

title: Special Conversation 1
text: Ugly monsters? Please don't speak of them like that. Those beings known as Corruptors are my most loyal audience.

title: Special Conversation 2
text: The center of a Black Ring is like the depths of the sea. In a place so serene, you can listen to your heart clearly.

title: Special Conversation 3
text: A brutal beast will not know how to love, so... please never turn into one.

title: Full Compliance
text: Certain emotions can only be expressed through dance. Come, give me your hand, follow my tempo... Can you... feel it, Chief?

title: Idle
text: Shh... Listen, that's the sound of your heart. Lub dub, lub dub... It's dancing too.

title: Annoyed
text: Are you... lonely? It's okay. I don't like to be touched by others, but you're the exception.

title: Special Attention
text: Such clear eyes... It must be wonderful to dance to the gaze from such a pair of eyes.

title: Dispatch
text: The sound of the wind... is a dance gifted to us by nature.

title: Dispatch Complete
text: I'm back. It was... a good experience.

title: Level Up
text: I feel... light as a feather?

title: Join Team
text: I can hear it... the prelude of the dance...

title: Head Pat
text: Hmm? Would you like to... dance with me?

title: Attire Obtained
text: Swaying bells and heavy drumbeats... Come, let's dance. Let's dance on this snowy night!

title: Greeting
text: Every day without dance is a letdown to life. So... Come and dance with me, will you, Chief?

title: Ordinary Contact 1
text: The steps, the emotions, the body, the mind... Each element is essential. It's not merely a dance, but also a hymn to the soul.

title: Ordinary Contact 2
text: The strong emotions in this dance complement the atmosphere of the festival perfectly... Can everyone feel it?

title: Ordinary Contact 3
text: It's been a long time since I last saw such pure smiles after a performance. It truly feels wonderful...

title: Ordinary Contact 4
text: How I wish time could stop at this moment tonight forever... Hmm... I'm indeed very greedy.

title: Idle
text: I was touched by the power and generosity in this dance during the practices. May all your pain and unhappiness be gone after watching this dance.

title: Level Up
text: The tempo... has quickened.

title: Head Pat (touch head)
text: Hmm...? This is an updo I specifically did for this dance. Do you... like it?

title: Special Attention
text: Now that you're looking at me, please don't turn your gaze away. I will deliver all my emotions to you through my dance.

title: Attire Obtained
text: Painful but elegant, each feather has its own story. This is a dance dedicated to you and you alone...

title: Greeting
text: Chief, this dance is very difficult. Those without proper training should not try the jumps and twirls.

title: Ordinary Contact 1
text: Black and white, light and darkness... are but two sides of the same coin. Just like Odette and Odile, whom I portray. In the prince's eyes, they've always been the same person.

title: Ordinary Contact 2
text: The scattered black feathers push the entire performance to its climax. Beauty and destruction are only a step away. This is the fate of beauty.

title: Ordinary Contact 3
text: Chief, who do you think I resemble more now? The innocent Swan Princess Odette, or the unbridled Black Swan Odile?

title: Ordinary Contact 4
text: Back then, people didn't want to see me portray Odile. They wanted to see absolute joy and beauty from me. I was more like the perfect white swan in their hearts, rather than a dancer...

title: Idle
text: Everyone knows that the soul and biggest challenge of this dance is Odile's thirty-two consecutive fouett√©s. Yet under your gaze, I completed it effortlessly...

title: Level Up
text: Let's spread our wings to our heart's content.

title: Head Pat (touch head)
text: You still want to try it...? Hmm, the final scene where I get lifted up... I think you can manage it.

title: Special Attention
text: How I wish we could be enveloped by music and dance, and savor this moment in bliss and freedom, forever.
